summary: Modern, professional, bilingual (English + Bengali) coaching centre website for Brilliant Coaching Centre in Puabagan, Bankura, West Bengal. Features hero section with logo and WhatsApp CTA, about us section, courses offered (LKG-Class XII), expanded why choose us section with 12 detailed strengths (personalized attention, structured curriculum, assessments, doubt-clearing, exam preparation, interactive learning, motivation, safe environment, study materials, parent involvement, technology integration, achievements), our teachers section with profiles, teachers & class notes section with downloadable PDFs, photo gallery with lightbox, testimonials section (What Our Students Say) with page title, introduction, current students reviews (Riya Sen, Anirban Das, Priya Roy), alumni feedback (Arjun Mukherjee, Sneha Chakraborty, Rohan Ghosh), review submission form with name/class/subjects/review/rating fields, admission enquiry form with WhatsApp integration, enhanced contact/footer section with multiple phone numbers, email, social media links (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, WhatsApp Channel), footer CTA buttons, and floating language switcher. Design matches official branding (gold/yellow text, dark background, maroon accent) with smooth animations and mobile-first approach.
architectural_notes: Bilingual support system (English + Bengali) with instant language switching
WhatsApp integration for enquiry form submissions and floating button
Brand color scheme: gold/yellow text, dark background, maroon accents
Smooth animations and hover effects throughout
Click-to-zoom lightbox functionality for photo gallery
Ready for future upgrades: Google Sheet integration, admin dashboard, email alerts, full coaching ERP
Tabbed navigation system for class-wise notes with default active tab (LKG-3)
Downloadable PDF notes feature for each teacher/class combination
